ingredients.item: 225g jar Waitrose Albacore Tuna in Extra Virgin Olive Oil
Grated zest and juice of 1 lemon

instructions.step: Add the spaghetti to a large pan of boiling water for 10 minutes until just cooked. Drain.  While the pasta is cooking, drain the tuna, reserving the oil, and flake the fish. Mix the flaked fish with the capers, lemon zest and juice and most of the shredded basil. Toss the drained pasta with the tuna mixture and 2 tablespoons of the reserved oil. Season, garnish with the reserved basil and serve.
